column4: Mac NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2). Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)
column5: (NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Sagona Bold Italic' ≠ 'Sagona Bo<mark>ok</mark> Bold Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

column4: MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2). Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)
column5: (NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Sagona Bold Italic' ≠ 'Sagona Bo<mark>ok</mark> Bold Italic' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).
